storyNodes.text: You are in a dark room. You can't see anything.
"You feel something hard and smooth on the wall to your right. It seems like it could be a switch or lever of some kind."

choices.text: "You pull on the switch or lever, and suddenly the room is flooded with light."
"You poke at it gingerly, but nothing happens."
"Feeling brave, you give it a good yank - and hear a loud rumble from behind the wall!"

storyNodes.text: "The room reveals an ancient treasure trove hidden for centuries. You grab some of the glittering jewels before continuing on your adventure."
"You find out that this was just a decorative element, but it leads you to another path with more challenges ahead."
"A secret passage opens up behind the wall, leading you deep into an unknown part of the castle. Will you follow it and see what lies beyond?"
"No one answers, but you hear distant footsteps approaching."

choices.text: "You decide to hide behind a nearby bush."
"You start running in the opposite direction."

storyNodes.text: "As you peek over the bush, you see that the footsteps have stopped. You wait for a moment before cautiously approaching the source of the sound and find it was just an old man walking his dog."

"After running for what feels like miles, you come across a small cabin in the woods. Knocking on the door, you're greeted by an elderly woman who invites you inside to escape the storm that has suddenly begun."

"The footsteps grow louder and closer until they stop right outside of where you are standing. A deep voice calls out your name, revealing it was a friend who had been searching for you after getting separated during the hike."
"After waiting for what feels like hours, you suddenly see a faint light in the distance."
